Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: On June 8, 2023, Roku, Inc. (“Roku”) held its annual meeting of stockholders via a live webcast (the “Annual Meeting”). At the Annual Meeting, Roku’s stockholders voted on four proposals, each of which is described in more detail in Roku’s definitive proxy statement filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on April 27, 2023 (the “Proxy Statement”). The following is a brief description of each matter voted on and the certified results, including the number of votes cast for, against or withheld, as applicable, and the number of abstentions and broker non-votes, as applicable, with respect to each matter.

subsections.Proposal 1: Election of Class II Directo: The Class II director nominee was elected to serve until Roku’s 2025 annual meeting of stockholders and until his successor is elected and qualified or until his earlier death, resignation or removal. The voting results were as follows: Director Name: Jeffrey Blackburn, Votes For: 242,125,595, Votes Withheld: 427,676, Broker Non-Votes: 23,783,532, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 99.8%.
subsections.Proposal 2: Election of Class III Direct: The Class III director nominees were elected to serve until Roku’s 2026 annual meeting of stockholders and in each case until their successors are elected and qualified or until their earlier death, resignation or removal. The voting results were as follows: Jeffrey Hastings - Votes For: 216,327,208, Votes Withheld: 26,226,063, Broker Non-Votes: 23,783,532, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 89.2%. Neil Hunt - Votes For: 218,568,131, Votes Withheld: 23,985,140, Broker Non-Votes: 23,783,532, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 90.1%. Anthony Wood - Votes For: 221,418,507, Votes Withheld: 21,134,764, Broker Non-Votes: 23,783,532, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 91.3%.
subsections.Proposal 3: Advisory Approval of Executi: Stockholders approved, on an advisory basis, Roku’s executive compensation as described in the Proxy Statement. The voting results were as follows: Votes For: 191,733,902, Votes Against: 50,638,684, Abstentions: 180,685, Broker Non-Votes: 23,783,532, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 79.0%.
subsections.Proposal 4: Ratification of Independent: Stockholders ratified the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as Roku’s independent registered accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2023. The voting results were as follows: Votes For: 265,565,239, Votes Against: 528,289, Abstentions: 243,275, Percentage of Votes in Favor: 99.7%.
